entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Kestrel: Connection id "XXX" application never completed. #44870
  • Calling `dotnet user-jwts` while app is running causes malformed appsettings #44869
  • A question about closures and render fragments. #44867
  • Provide a pure code model for creating and working with Blazor components #44866
  • Grpc issue in native build of aspnetcore on ppc64le #44859
  • Using SignalR Clients.All.SendAsync in a registered Middlware without disconnecting when making a request to trigger middleware. #44858

Closed

  • Blazor Wasm ( Hosted )Template project issue with Authentication #44262
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Blazor] Unexpected component initialization #44766
  • Update Blazor WASM Baselines Tests to Indicate Unexpected Files #43834
    8.0-MQ
  • Default Blazor project won't build due to missing browser-wasm 6.0.11 package #44828
  • Returning SignOutResult produces an incorrectly formatted return URL #43383
    Discussions
  • Invalid redirect to RedirectUrl on error during 2FA #44395
    8.0-preview1
  • Mainlayout Page prevents the responsive table rendering when element has 100% width #44840
  • Compiler warning when StateHasChanged is called from OnAfterRender #44846
  • React/Redux/ASP.Net Core templates for .Net 6.0 #44830
  • "AspNetCore.HealthChecks.SqlServer": "6.0.2" vulnerability package #44760
  • Extra config not available in IHosting startup classes #44847
  • CORS error when deploying Net 6 API on docker #44694

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] Use new Arm64 Helix queues #44868
    area-infrastructure
  • Use backport workflow from arcade repo #44865
    area-infrastructure
  • HttpSys request header dictionary does not remove headers when Remove() is called #44860
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Remove unnecessary ToArray call #44864
    Perf, area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix invalid redirection after 2FA sign-in (#44395) #44435
    area-identity, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Produce arch-specific ANCM redist packages #44849
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 6.0.x

Updated

  • Update branding to 7.0.1 #44768
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Make Kestrel prefer on-disk cert for macOS bind. #44856
  • Make Kestrel prefer on-disk cert for macOS bind. #44835
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Initial Form-binding support #44653
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Set ApiParameterDescription.Type to `string` for Simple Types #44747
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update selenium dependency versions #44834
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2036478 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Produce arch-specific ANCM redist packages #44848
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure
  • source-build: don't use crossgen when building for mono runtime. #44842
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Annotate WebAssembly.Authentication for nullability #43442
    area-blazor
  • Add transport selector interface to Kestrel sockets and QUIC transports #44832
    area-runtime
  • Nullable cleanup #43451
    area-web-frameworks
